extends org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin

      • getPhatLoots

        public static java.util.LinkedList<PhatLoot> getPhatLoots(org.bukkit.block.Block block,
                                          org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Returns a List of all PhatLoots that are linked to the given Block PhatLoots which the given Player does not have permission to loot are not returned

        player - The given Player
        Returns:
        The LinkedList of PhatLoots

      • getPhatLoots

        public static java.util.LinkedList<PhatLoot> getPhatLoots(org.bukkit.block.Block block)
        Returns a List of all PhatLoots that are linked to the given Block AutoLinking is first checked and then explicit linking if AutoLinking returns 0 results
        Parameters:
        block - The given Block
        Returns:
        The LinkedList of PhatLoots
